FAQS.QUESTION: What is the return policy?
FAQS.ANSWER: Our return policy is 30 days with a receipt.

FAQS.QUESTION: How do I track my order?
FAQS.ANSWER: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email.

FAQS.QUESTION: Can I purchase items again?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, you can repurchase items by visiting your order history.

FAQS.QUESTION: Do you offer international shipping?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries.

FAQS.QUESTION: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQS.ANSWER: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal.

FAQS.QUESTION: How can I contact customer support?
FAQS.ANSWER: You can contact customer support through our website or by calling our toll-free number.

FAQS.QUESTION: Is there a loyalty program?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, we have a loyalty program that offers rewards for frequent shoppers.

FAQS.QUESTION: Can I cancel my order?
FAQS.ANSWER: Orders can be cancelled within 24 hours of placing the order.

FAQS.QUESTION: What do I do if my package is damaged?
FAQS.ANSWER: Please contact customer support with photos of the damaged package for assistance.

FAQS.QUESTION: Do you offer gift wrapping?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional fee during checkout.

FAQS.QUESTION: How do I change my shipping address?
FAQS.ANSWER: You can change your shipping address before your order has been shipped by contacting customer support.

FAQS.QUESTION: What is your store location?
FAQS.ANSWER: Our main store is located at [address], with additional locations in [city/region].

FAQS.QUESTION: How can I check the status of my refund?
FAQS.ANSWER: You can check the status of your refund by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

FAQS.QUESTION: Can I return an item bought online to a physical store?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, online purchases can be returned to any of our physical store locations.

FAQS.QUESTION: Do you offer expedited shipping?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, we offer expedited shipping options at checkout for faster delivery.

FAQS.QUESTION: Are there any items that cannot be returned?
FAQS.ANSWER: Some items such as perishable goods or personalized items may not be eligible for return.

FAQS.QUESTION: What should I do if I receive the wrong item?
FAQS.ANSWER: Please contact customer support immediately with details of the incorrect item received.

FAQS.QUESTION: How do I unsubscribe from your mailing list?
FAQS.ANSWER: You can unsubscribe from our mailing list by clicking the 'unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any promotional email.

FAQS.QUESTION: Is there a minimum order amount for free shipping?
FAQS.ANSWER: Yes, orders over a certain amount qualify for free standard shipping. Please check our website for current thresholds.

FAQS.QUESTION: Do you offer installation services for your products?
FAQS.ANSWER: Installation services are available for select products. Please contact customer support for more information.
